b'The Bugatti 57SC Atlantic Coupe.

Only one of four ever built, it has long been one of the most legendary automobiles of all time. b'\xe2\x80\x9cThe ultimate gift is your love,\xe2\x80\x9d says #AwengAdeChuol to her wife, Alexus, on the set of our Holiday campaign.

\xe2\x80\x9cI think that for me, the moments that have been great are just every day coming home to my wife and coming home to love and family," says Aweng. "Coming home to cook, help and contribute to home, to make it more inviting and loving for the both of us."

b'In times of uncertainty such as these, we look for silver linings to guide us forward.

\xe2\x80\x9cNothing is more important than love and your family,\xe2\x80\x9d says #RegitzeChristensen, a Danish model and expectant mother who is featured in our Holiday campaign alongside her fianc\xc3\xa9, #TwahleeRollins.

\xe2\x80\x9cThis year, we\xe2\x80\x99ve been able to spend so much time together and because of that, we\xe2\x80\x99ve created a life together,\xe2\x80\x9d Regitze says.

For Regitze, her first pregnancy is symbolic of hope. As their family grows, Regitze and Twahlee have been given a profound opportunity \xe2\x80\x94 to keep love at the forefront and cherish each other through every moment.

\xe2\x80\x9cHow can you not have hope when there\xe2\x80\x99s love out there?\xe2\x80\x9d says Twahlee.

b"\xe2\x80\x9cTo be a good sportsman, to be a good teammate, involves listening to one another. It involves understanding a different point of view and respecting it. I think that directly translates to any individual in society who wishes to create a more unified world,\xe2\x80\x9d says #MaroItoje, an English professional rugby player.

As part of our Holiday campaign, Maro speaks with us about the importance of respect, openness, and unconditional love. Born in London with brother Jeremy and raised by Nigerian parents Efe and Florence, Maro turns to his family and traditions to inspire his work, on and off the field. 

Like Maro, members of the Parisian dance company #LaMarcheBleue use their passion for artistic expression to spread a hopeful message of unity.

\xe2\x80\x9cYou can transmit things that are really only limited to universal languages, things that you couldn't even tell your best friend, and someone will understand it just by watching you dance. That's powerful,\xe2\x80\x9d explains #LeoWalk, choreographer, dancer, and founder of La Marche Bleue. 

Discover more from our Holiday campaign as families from around the world share their stories \xe2\x80\x94 captured by multiple creators \xe2\x80\x94 via the link in bio.

b"\xe2\x80\x9cHome isn\xe2\x80\x99t a place. It\xe2\x80\x99s people,\xe2\x80\x9d says model, mother, and wife, #QinShupei.

As part of our Holiday campaign, people from around the world reflect on the meaning of family, in all its forms.

We captured a collection of stories about belonging, chosen families, friendship, and people coming together in the spirit of love.

\xe2\x80\x9cWe don't get to choose our family, but we can choose our friends,\xe2\x80\x9d says #AlexusAdeChuol, a nail artist entrepreneur featured alongside her wife, #AwengAdeChuol, in our campaign. 

\xe2\x80\x9cMost of the people in my life have been here for so long and we've gone through so much, that they are literally my family,\xe2\x80\x9d Alexus says.

b"\xe2\x80\x9cWe were inseparable and when you become inseparable with someone who\xe2\x80\x99s not related to you by blood, I think that\xe2\x80\x99s someone you would consider your chosen family,\xe2\x80\x9d says @KareemRosser, Work to Ride graduate and author.

b'For this year\xe2\x80\x99s @USOpen campaign, @PoloRalphLauren set out to expand the definition of heroism in the age of COVID-19. In honor of a new generation of heroes, we invited New York City frontline workers to share their experiences.

\xe2\x80\x9cI went from treating people with sports injuries and improving quality of life, to taking care of those who are critically ill and trying to save a life.
